changelog_v11_item1.message: Added Changelog section to the welcome page.

changelog_v11_item2.message: Updated links: “Rate 5 stars” now points directly to the extension’s page instead of the installed extensions list.

changelog_v11_item3.message: Added speed button to the Shorts interface.

changelog_v11_item4.message: Added button to switch from normal YouTube player to Shorts.

changelog_v11_item5.message: Keyboard shortcuts: Shift + > to increase playback speed in YouTube Shorts.

changelog_v11_item6.message: Keyboard shortcuts: Shift + < to decrease playback speed in YouTube Shorts.

changelog_v11_item7.message: Overlay message: shows current playback speed when changed via keyboard shortcuts.

changelog_v10_item1.message: Added button to rotate Shorts, hide the interface, and switch from Shorts to normal YouTube player.

changelog_v10_item2.message: Keyboard shortcuts: R (rotate), S (switch video), O (hide UI).

changelog_v10_item3.message: Pop-up window with tips about keyboard shortcuts.

manifest_description.message: YouTube Shorts360: Adds a button to rotate shorts, hide UI, switch to a video, and control playback speed in YouTube Shorts.
